document_data.name: Harper's House
document_data.mainbody: The '''Harper's House''' was the name given to the personal residence of [[Chesslyn Onaubra]], the local guardswoman that offered her home as a safehouse to her fellow members of the [[Harpers]].
document_data.Location: It was located in the southeast side of [[Mulmaster]], not too far away from the city's docks.
document_data.Structure: Perfect for spies and information-gatherers, the home was a rather non-descript brick-and-wood building that did not attract unneeded attention to Chesslyn's comings and goings.

Interior.Atmosphere: With its cozy and welcoming atmosphere, the Harper's House was a welcome refuge for agents operating in the harsh city of Mulmaster.
